data.taskTitle: complete but active sessions show signal /jat:start commands for new sessions
Fix cross-session signal pollution in EventStack
summary: Identified race condition: UserPromptSubmit hook fires BEFORE /jat:start updates agent file
Fixed user-prompt-signal.sh to skip /jat:start commands entirely
The /jat:start skill emits its own starting signal which is the proper event for new sessions
reviewFocus: Verify regex ^/jat:start correctly matches all /jat:start variants
Confirm starting signal from /jat:start skill is sufficient for timeline visibility
